column1: In addition to cosmology , Bruno also wrote extensively on the art of memory , a loosely organized group of mnemonic techniques and principles .

Benton is a city in and the county seat of Saline County , Arkansas , United States and a suburb of Little Rock .	Benton is a city in and the county seat of Saline County , Arkansas in the United States .
